text: Begum Khaleda Zia (; born 1945) is a former Prime Minister of Bangladesh. She was Prime Minister from 1991 to 1996, and also from 2001 to 2006. She was the first woman Prime Minister in Bangladesh. Zia is the widow of assassinated President of Bangladesh Ziaur Rehman. She leads his old political party, the Bangladesh Nationalist Party (BNP). == References == Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Bangladesh Category:Bangladeshi Muslims Category:5th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:6th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:7th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:8th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:9th Jatiya Sangsad members
title: Khaleda Zia
